content: Allows `Class.StyleSheet|StyleSheets` in `Class.Plugin|Plugins` to be styled.
[https://luau.org/demo](https://luau.org/demo) now supports type checking.
Reduces the size of `Class.Instance` on 64-bit systems by 8 bytes. Will generally save a few MBs of memory in games due to the number of instances.
In the New Luau Type Solver, `Global.LuaGlobals.getmetatable()`now works on refined instances of an `any` type.
Changes the source of "Ping" in the Performance Stats UI to match `Class.Player:GetNetworkPing()`, which better represents current network conditions.
Fixed an issue where MicroProfiler and Performance panel text display was corrupted.
Fixes Studio bug with `Datatype.Content` formatting in the Explorer.
Improves performance of `Class.Instance` return by 30% with extra improvements for `Class.Instance:GetDescendants()` and `Class.Instance:QueryDescendants()` where large arrays are returned.
`Class.Instance:QueryDescendants()` call with `[ClassName=name]` property match is now 2x faster.
Splits up the Microprofiler `Sound` scope into more meaningful phases of execution.
Adds `Class.AudioPlayer.AutoPlay`, allowing `Class.AudioPlayer|AudioPlayers` to be played on startup automatically.
Fixes `Rx` "Batch Data" network events not expanding properly in the Microprofiler (`Tx` still not supported).
Adds a new `Class.VideoSampler` object for getting image frames from a video content.
A `Class.PathfindingModifier` with no `Class.PathfindingModifier.Label|Label` and `Class.PathfindingModifier.PassThrough|PassThrough` set to `true` won't affect navigation.
Adds the `Class.GenerationService:GenerateModelAsync()` function to `Class.GenerationService`.
Fixes an issue where, if a `Class.TextBox` receives focus and then gets parented to `nil`, its `Class.TextBox.Text|Text` property may be cleared, even if `Class.TextBox.ClearTextOnFocus` is `false`.
Fixes a bug where Luau's type system would lose track of some components of an intersection type when using `Library.table.clone()`.
Adds the flexibility to define `Class.ParticleEmitter` flipbook layouts without any limitations on texture size.
Fixes a bug in Luau's type checking where `Library.table.clone()` would sometimes erroneously error when provided a value from a returning function.
Fixes a rare crash when `Class.AudioEmitter|AudioEmitters` or `Class.AudioListener|AudioListeners` finish their acoustic simulation work too quickly.
Fixes buttons to open the Material Manager and Material Generator from the Material picker in the toolbar.
Sets a limit on the number of nested deferred events that can be executed per-source in a single frame.
Fixes a crash when exporting OBJs with emissive maps beta enabled.
Re-adds missing "down arrow" icon in the Developer Console.
